snippet: China will raise its defense budget by about 7 percent this year, a government spokeswoman said Saturday, continuing a trend of lowered growth amid a slowing economy....

headline.main: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation
headline.print_headline: All 36 Victims of Ghost Ship Fire Died From Smoke Inhalation

lead_paragraph: China will raise its defense budget by about 7 percent this year, a government spokeswoman said Saturday, continuing a trend of lowered growth amid a slowing economy.
